<div align=center><h1>Ziro</h1>
<p>
  Ziro is a beautiful Spotify theme inspired by <a href=https://github.com/ZorinOS/zorin-desktop-themes/tree/master/ZorinBlue-Dark>Zorin Blue Dark</a>/<a href=https://github.com/ZorinOS/zorin-desktop-themes/tree/master/ZorinBlue-Light>Light</a> GTK theme and <a href=https://github.com/xou816/spot>spot</a>.</p>
<a href=https://github.com/khanhas/spicetify-cli><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/spicetify-cli-FE6F61?labelColor=FAFAFA&style=flat-square"></img></a>
<a href=https://github.com/schnensch0/zelk/releases/latest><img src="https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/schnensch0/ziro?color=bde6fb&sort=semver&style=flat-square&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,"></img></a></div>

### INSTALLATION
cd into your Themes directory and
```bash
git clone https://github.com/schnensch0/ziro.git Ziro
```

previews coming soon
